verses.verse: (A Prayer of David.) <S%H5186>Incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [and] <S%H6030>answer<s%> me; For I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>
Do <S%H8104>preserve<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> for I am a <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>man;<s%> O Thou my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in Thee.
Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> For to Thee I <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
<S%H8055>Make<s%> <S%H8055>glad<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> For to Thee, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

For Thou, <S%H136>Lord,<s%> art <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H5546>ready<s%> to <S%H5546>forgive,<s%> And <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Thee.
<S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer;<s%> And <S%H7181>give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications!<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I shall <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Thee, For Thou wilt <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.
<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee among the <S%H430>gods,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord;<s%> <S%H369>Nor<s%> are <S%H369>there<s%> any <S%H4639>works<s%> like Thine.

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee, O <S%H136>Lord;<s%> And they shall <S%H3513>glorify<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
For Thou art <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6213>doest<s%> <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H6381>deeds;<s%> Thou <S%H905>alone<s%> art <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me Thy <S%H1870>way,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in Thy <S%H571>truth;<s%> <S%H3161>Unite<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3824>heart,<s%> And will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
For Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> me is <S%H1419>great,<s%> And Thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H8482>depths<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> <S%H2086>men<s%> have <S%H6965>risen<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> me, And a <S%H5712>band<s%> of <S%H6184>violent<s%> <S%H6184>men<s%> have <S%H1245>sought<s%> my <S%H5315>life,<s%> And they have not <S%H7760>set<s%> Thee <S%H5048>before<s%> them.

But Thou, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> art a <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H750>Slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth.<s%>

<S%H6437>Turn<s%> to me, and be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me; Oh <S%H5414>grant<s%> Thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> And <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Thy <S%H519>handmaid.<s%>

<S%H6213>Show<s%> me a <S%H226>sign<s%> for <S%H9186>good,<s%> That those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me may <S%H7200>see<s%> [it], and be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> hast <S%H5826>helped<s%> me and <S%H5162>comforted<s%> me.
